0x0001.description: Fired when a server is starting.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.002: the name of the server that is starting

0x0002.description: Fired after a server has started.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.002: the name of the server that has started

0x0003.description: Fired when a server is stopping.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.002: the name of the server that is stopping

0x0004.description: Fired after a server has stopped.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.002: the name of the server that has stopped

0x0005.description: Fired when a server has crashed.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.002: the name of the server that has crashed

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.002: the name of the server to start

0x0007.description: Request to stop a server.  The emmitter will wait for the server to stop before returning.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.002: the name of the server to stop

0x0007.return: True if the server was stopped successfully, False otherwise

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.002: the name of the server to restart

0x0009.description: Request to create a new server.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.002: the name of the server to create
arguments.003: the type of the server to create
arguments.004: the path where the server will be created
arguments.006: the Minecraft version for the server
arguments.008: the amount of RAM to allocate

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.002: the name of the server to delete

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.002: the current name of the server
arguments.003: the new name for the server

0x000C.description: Fired after a server has been created.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.002: the name of the server that was created
arguments.004: the path where the server was created
arguments.006: the Minecraft version for the server

0x000D.description: Fired after a server has been deleted.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.002: the name of the server that was deleted

0x000E.description: Fired after a server has been renamed.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.002: the previous name of the server
arguments.003: the new name of the server

0x000F.description: Request a list of all servers.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent

0x000F.return: A list of dictionaries, each containing server information

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.002: the name of the server to ping

0x0010.return: Returns the server's status as a string: "online", "offline", or "starting".

0x0011.description: Request the world seed of a server. Returns the seed as a string.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent

0x0011.return: The world seed as a string

0x0012.description: Request detailed information about a server. Returns a dictionary containing server information.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent

0x0013.description: Fired when a server is being created.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.002: the name of the server being created
arguments.004: the path where the server will be created
arguments.006: the Minecraft version for the server
arguments.008: the amount of RAM to allocate

x0014.description: Request the time a server was started. Returns a datetime object representing the start time.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent

x0014.return: The datetime object representing the server's start time

0x0101.description: Fired when a console message is received from a server.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent

0x0102.description: Fired when a log message is received from a server.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent

0x0103.description: Request to send a message to a server's console.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent

0x0104.description: Request to send a command to a server's console.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent

0x0201.description: Fired when a player joins a server.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.003: the name of the player who joined

0x0202.description: Fired when a player leaves a server.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.003: the name of the player who left

0x0203.description: Fired when a player is kicked from a server.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.003: the name of the player who was kicked

0x0204.description: Fired when a player is banned from a server.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.003: the name of the player who was banned

0x0205.description: Fired when a player is pardoned (unbanned) from a server.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.003: the name of the player who was pardoned

0x0206.description: Request to kick a player from a server.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.003: the name of the player to kick
arguments.004: the reason for kicking the player

0x0207.description: Request to ban a player from a server.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.003: the name of the player to ban
arguments.004: the reason for banning the player

0x0208.description: Request to pardon (unban) a player from a server.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent
arguments.003: the name of the player to pardon

0x0209.description: Request a list of all players currently online on a server.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent

0x0301.description: Request a list of all available Minecraft versions.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent

0x0301.return: A list of available Minecraft versions

0x0302.description: Request a list of all available Forge versions for a specific Minecraft version.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent

0x0302.return: A list of dictionaries, each containing one Forge version and information about it

0x0401.description: Request a list of all available Minecraft directories.

arguments.001: the exact time the message was sent

0x0401.return: A list of available Minecraft directories, set in the config file
